# apparmor
## usage
```
# ./ctrsploit_linux_amd64  env a 
INFO[0000] ===========Apparmor=========
Kernel Supported: ✘
Container Enabled: ✘
```

```
# ./ctrsploit_linux_amd64  env  a
INFO[0000] ===========Apparmor=========
Kernel Supported: ✔
Container Enabled: ✔
Apparmor Profile: docker-default (enforce)
Apparmor Mode: enforce
```
